text:
Title: Dispose Paradise (Break, Throw, Separate Paradise)

Translation: Hoarder on the Border

Year: 2022

Country: Japan

Language: Japanese

Runtime: 101 mins

Cast:

* Shigeru Izumiya as Rusaku Kariya
* Masayasu Kitayama as Tsuguru Ichikawa
* Tom Mutou as Kotaro Sumida
* Meru Tashima as Ayami Takeuchi

Summary:

This heartwarming human dramedy consists of six episodes centered around the theme of hoarding. After losing his career as a pianist due to hand tremors, protagonist Rusaku Kariya starts working at Dispose Paradise, a cleaning service specializing in hoarded homes. He encounters eccentric superiors and clients facing diverse situations, revealing a strange world that defies imagination.
